::KitKat::

She heard the words leave Aracnia's lips, but they left a sour 
feeling in KitKat.  No predacon every just gave away something for 
nothing.  But then again, she found that she could use Aracnia and 
possably benefit more from this deal than she originally thought. but 
one doesn't rush into a deal, not without checking out al the 
angles. "I thank you Aracnia for your gracious offer. Yes, I shall 
need time to think about it.  I shall give my answer in a day or two."
KitKat may not be a natural born leader, but she knew that in 
business, one attracted more flies with honey than vinigar. And 
Aracnia's words were dripping with honey.  
"Aracnia, I was thinking. And please feel free to give your opinion, 
but if we are to unite all the pred groups, would it not be a good 
idea to create our own Predacon council here on earth, modelled after 
the Cybtronian council. This way all the leaders would have a say, as 
captians of thier own groups.  You would direct your group, as I 
would with mine, but the council as a whole would make the 
dicisions.  This would also increase our trust with one another.  We 
would sit equally at the table, leader to leader. And this would also 
strengthen us against the maximals."

She looked and saw the intruder light blinking on her wrist monitor.  
She contacted Starscream on her link. "Starscream, there appears to 
be a bot at our entrance. Would you be so kind as to find out what 
the bot needs and take care of things untill I finished here. Thank 
you."


She turned back to Aracnia,"What do you think, rule together?"



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, JP3884@a... wrote:
>     Aracnia looked to Cyber Claw with caution in her optics, "Calm 
down, the 
> bots who let you in were kitkat and Drillbit. Dont be concerned 
with them, 
> not yet." Turning, she could hear Dark Mouses cries from the other 
room.
>     If Aracnia could do one thing good, it was to hold a grudge. 
That little 
> vermine was a deserter, she left Aracnia without so much as telling 
anyone 
> else. Bots like those had one fate in the Predacons......death. 
Slow and 
> painful. Of course she didnt intend to kill her little mouse, not 
at all, 
> actually she was going to let her dangle on her hook until she came 
running 
> back to Aracnia. Then Aracnia would inform her of what ahppens to 
treachorus 
> Predacons....and tell her that she was no better than Megatron. 
That would 
> send anybot into a downward spiral of self hate and depression. 
Aracnia 
> frowned......what a waste of liquid energone too.
>     "So, Kitkat, as I was saying......Our groups should unite. 
Under your 
> direction of course. Im willing to comply with you so that the 
Predacons can 
> once agian be united. If you want to come to my base and check that 
out it 
> can be arranged, anything you need I shall provide you with." Black 
Aracnia 
> said, tring to ignore that idiot Starscreams rants and raves about 
her true 
> intentions......bots like those got an even worse death than 
deserters....
>     Aracnia smiled, a rare event, "Will you require time to think 
about this, 
> Commander?"
> 
>     Nighteyes limped through the forest, turning at Aracnia 
cruiser. Mech 
> fluid was pouring out of her like a fountian. Megatron had shot her 
in the 
> thigh.....and she needed a CR chamber. Hell Beast cast her out for 
being a 
> female, and said it would lead to internal conflict. The closest 
base was 
> Kitkats.....and she knew she would be recived very well, but death 
was apon 
> her like the sunset was apon the land.
>     She got to the door, and fell, scratching her claws agianst the 
door. 
> "Help, please! S.O.S.! Help me, someone!" She cried in vain....time 
was 
> short, and she began to feel light headed.
